verses.verse: In The <S%G3588><s%> Freedom <S%G1657><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Wherewith <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Made Free, <S%G1659><s%> Stand Fast, <S%G4739><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> In A Yoke <S%G2218><s%> Of Bondage <S%G1397><s%> He Held. <S%G1758><s%>

Lo, <S%G1492><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Paul 3972 N-NSM Say 3004 V-PAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP That 3754 CONJ If 1437 COND Ye Be Circumcised, 4059 V-PPS-2P Christ 5547 N-NSM You 5209 P-2AP Nothing 3762 A-ASN Shall Profit. 5623 V-FAI-3S

<S%G3143><s%> And I Testify <S%G1161><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> To Every <S%G3956><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Being Circumcised, <S%G4059><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Debtor <S%G3781><s%> He Is <S%G2076><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> To Do. <S%G4160><s%>

Ye Are Deprived Of All Effect <S%G2673><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Whosoever <S%G3748><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> Are Being Justified; <S%G1344><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Ye Fell From. <S%G1601><s%>
<S%G2249><s%> For We, <S%G1063><s%> By The Spirits <S%G4151><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> The Hope <S%G1680><s%> Of Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Await. <S%G553><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> For In <S%G1063><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> Circumcision <S%G4061><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Is Of Force, <S%G2480><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> Uncircumcision; <S%G203><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Working. <S%G1754><s%>

Ye Were Running <S%G5143><s%> Well : <S%G2573><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Hindered <S%G1465><s%> <S%G348><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Obey? <S%G3982><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> Persuasion <S%G3988><s%> Is Not <S%G3756><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Calls <S%G2564><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>
A Little <S%G3398><s%> Leaven <S%G2219><s%> Whole <S%G3650><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lump <S%G5445><s%> Leavens. <S%G2220><s%>

I 1473 P-1NS Am Persuaded 3982 V-2RAI-1S As To 1519 PREP You 5209 P-2AP In The 1722 PREP Lord, 2962 N-DSM That 3754 CONJ 3762 A-ASN 243 A-ASN Ye Will Have No Other Mind, 5426 V-FAI-2P 3588 T-NSM And He 1161 CONJ Troubling 5015 V-PAP-NSM You 5209 P-2AP Shall Bear 941 V-FAI-3S The 3588 T-ASN Judgment, 2917 N-ASN 3748 R-NSM Whosoever 302 PRT He May Be. 5600 V-PXS-3S

<S%G1473><s%> But I 1161 CONJ Brethren, 80 N-VPM If 1487 COND Circumcision 4061 N-ASF Yet 2089 ADV I Proclaim, 2784 V-PAI-1S Why 5101 I-ASN Yet 2089 ADV Am I Persecuted? 1377 V-PPI-1S Then 686 PRT Has Been Done Away 2673 V-RPI-3S The 3588 T-NSN Offense 4625 N-NSN Of The 3588 T-GSM Cross. 4716 N-GSM
I Would <S%G3785><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> They Would Cut Themselves Off <S%G609><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Throw Into Confusion <S%G387><s%> You. <S%G5209><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> For Ye <S%G1063><s%> ' For <S%G1909><s%> Freedom <S%G1657><s%> Were Called, <S%G2564><s%> Brethren; <S%G80><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> Use Not <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Freedom <S%G1657><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> An Occasion <S%G874><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> But <S%G235><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Serve Ye <S%G1398><s%> One Another. <S%G240><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For The Whole <S%G3956><s%> Law <S%G3551><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%>, Is Fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thou Shalt Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4139><s%> Thy Neighbour <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Thyself; <S%G1438><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> Ye Bite <S%G1143><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Devour, <S%G2719><s%> Take Heed <S%G991><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> Ye Be Consumed. <S%G355><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> But I Say, <S%G1161><s%> By The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Walk Ye, <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Desire <S%G1939><s%> Flesh's <S%G4561><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Should Ye Fulfil. <S%G5055><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> For The <S%G1063><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Desires <S%G1937><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh; <S%G4561><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Are Opposed <S%G480><s%> To One Another, <S%G240><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> Ye May Wish <S%G2309><s%> Those Things <S%G5023><s%> Ye Should Do; <S%G4160><s%>
<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> By The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Ye Are Led, <S%G71><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Are No <S%G2075><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Law. <S%G3551><s%>

Manifest <S%G5318><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%>, Adultery, <S%G3430><s%> Fornication, <S%G4202><s%> Uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> Licentiousness, <S%G766><s%>

Idolatry, <S%G1495><s%> Sorcery, <S%G5331><s%> Enmities, <S%G2189><s%>, Strifes, <S%G2054><s%>, Jealousies, <S%G2205><s%> Indignations, <S%G2372><s%> Contentions, <S%G2052><s%> Divisions, <S%G1370><s%> Sects, <S%G139><s%>

Envyings, <S%G5355><s%>, Murders, <S%G5408><s%> Drunkennesses, <S%G3178><s%> Revels, <S%G2970><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Things <S%G3588><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> These; <S%G5125><s%> As To Which <S%G3739><s%> I Tell Beforehand <S%G4302><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Said Before, <S%G4277><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such Things <S%G5108><s%> Do <S%G4238><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> God's <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Inherit. <S%G2816><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> Joy, <S%G5479><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> Long Suffering, <S%G3115><s%> Kindness, <S%G5544><s%> Goodness, <S%G19><s%> Faith, <S%G4102><s%>
Meekness, <S%G4236><s%> Self Control : <S%G1466><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such Things <S%G5108><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is No <S%G2076><s%> Law. <S%G3551><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But They That Are <S%G1161><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Crucified <S%G4717><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passions <S%G3804><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Desires. <S%G1939><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> We Live <S%G2198><s%> By The Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> By The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> We Should Walk. <S%G4748><s%>
<S%G3361><s%> We Should Not Become <S%G1096><s%> Vain Glorious, <S%G2755><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> Provoking, <S%G4292><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> Envying. <S%G5354><s%>
